Package net.abi.abisEngine.util

Class Color

java.lang.Object
net.abi.abisEngine.math.Vector3f
net.abi.abisEngine.util.Color
public class Color
extends Vector3f
This Class Allows To Have A Alpha Value To Be Set And Wraps Around A Vector3f To Include Alpha As Well.
Author:
abinash
